description: Red lentils are a beautiful color orange when dry, but they become a rather drab yellow when they cook This can be disappointing, until you taste the lentils.
title: Red Lentil Soup Recipe
title_page: Red Lentil Soup Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: When I was developing this soup, I served it two ways: as a rustic, thick lentil and tomato soup, and as a puree. My ten-year-old son liked it better as a thick lentil soup, and I preferred the texture and especially the look of the puree. You can try it both ways.
